com.anifichadia.toolkit.math.statistics

Class Statistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.anifichadia.toolkit.math.statistics.Statistics

  • public class Statistics
extends java.lang.Object
    Calculates and stores basic statistical values (mean, variance, standard deviation and median) for a data set.

    Note: Calculations are for the population, not a sample.
    Author:
    Aniruddh Fichadia | Email: Ani.Fichadia@gmail.com | GitHub Username: AniFichadia (http://github.com/AniFichadia)
